document.full_text: corey perry of the anaheim ducks, daniel sedin of the vancouver canucks and steven stamkos of the tampa bay lightning are named finalists on thursday for the ted lindsay award as the nhl's most outstanding player.
document.title: perry, sedin and stamkos finalists for ted lindsay award
lines_and_colors: corey perry of the anaheim ducks, daniel sedin of the vancouver canucks and steven stamkos of the tampa bay lightning are named finalists on thursday for the ted lindsay award as the nhl's most outstanding player.
